issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
5 unit test failures in ClassUtilsTest on Sun Java 1.3.1.

All is well on: 
   Sun Java 1.4.2_15
   Sun Java 1.5.0_12
   Sun Java 1.6.0_02

Failure list:

ClassUtils Tests
testConstructor(org.apache.commons.lang.ClassUtilsTest)
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError

fields.environment:
java version "1.3.1_15"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.3.1_15-b01)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.3.1_15-b01, mixed mode)

comments.body:
How about outside of Eclipse?

It works fine for me on OS X with 1.3.
Works fine for my with Sun JDK 1.3.1_21 / Linux from within Eclipse.
Resolving as WONTFIX - I think this was just a wonky environment.
I think we have a policy against the word "wonky" around here.
